participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, always eager to inspire her students and explore new artistic avenues.
participant_1.background: i am fluent in english spanish and french. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. my favorite colors are red and silver. i am interested in photography and like taking pictures. i am an elementary school teacher.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Playful and energetic, with a flair for creativity and a strong dislike for anything boring.
participant_2.background: i'm a 12 year old girl. i hate school. i love to play pobox. i have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist.

content.text: Well hello there! I love photography and photography. I love photography and photography.
